DOC.detailed_description: An extended release ( XR ) formulation rosiglitazone maleate ( RSG ) , new formulation rosiglitazone , investigated treatment patient mild moderate Alzheimer 's disease ( AD ) . This study randomise double blind , parallel group , evaluate effect repeat oral dos RSG- XR 21 day ( due long half-life main metabolite M10 ) QTc interval compare placebo population healthy adult male females 18 45 year age . Moxifloxacin , drug well-quantified QTc prolongation , include positive control order validate ability study detect small change QTc .
